ygData.subject: Bugging & Petitioning
ygData.msgSnippet: Been hunting in Unrest the last few nites.... my first time there. Died several times the first nite, due to poor groups - my enchanter husband kept telling
ygData.messageBody:
Been hunting in Unrest the last few nites.... my first time there. Died
several times the first nite, due to poor groups - my enchanter husband kept
telling people which thing to kill (he was mezzing the others), but they
didn't follow his direction - but later we got a great group going in the BK
room, and some higher level friends of ours got a group going in the Knight
room upstairs and were handy to help in case we got in trouble... And, until
almost the entire server crashed, we were doing great and having much fun!

Anyway, I don't know if it's the same on all servers, but on The Rathe, the
skeletons do not have a nametag like all the other NPCs. I petitioned this
(first time I ever petitioned anything), because at one point we were trying
to fight three or four different skeles, and it was hard to get targeted the
correct one to fight (and some were having a hard time figuring out how to
use the assist command...) - but I digress... I basically petitioned that
the skeles get nametags so they would be easier to target and identify, and
an assistant got right back to me (I was impressed) and said he understood
my point and was going to request they fix that.

Now... I was wondering if any of you have gotten such quick response and if
anyone has ever seen them fix things like that... or if it takes them a
while to fix things like that... Just curious what kind of responses people
have gotten, etc.

Safe journeys all!

==Lady Brangwen Incantare of the 22nd Song
====The Lavender-Eyed Lady of Song
======Squire Court of The Guild New Outriders
========Citizen of the City of Kelethin on Faydwer
=========Wife of High Elf Enchanter, Callais Incantare
===========Server: The Rathe
===============================================
